mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dogorder ( o_amount, o_sendname, o_sendphone, o_takename, o_takephone, o_takeaddress, o_title, o_pay, o_price, o_number, o_date ) VALUES ( #{o_amount}, #{o_sendname}, #{o_sendphone}, #{o_takename}, #{o_takephone}, #{o_takeaddress}, #{o_title}, #{o_pay}, #{o_price}, #{o_number}, #{o_date} )
mapper.select:
SELECT o_idx as o_idx, o_takename as o_takename, o_takephone as o_takephone, o_takeaddress as o_takeaddress, o_price as o_price, o_amount as o_amount, o_title as o_title, o_pay as o_pay, o_date as o_date
FROM dogorder
SELECT o_idx, date_format(o_date,'%Y-%m') o_ym_date, sum(o_price * o_amount) total_price FROM dogorder ta GROUP BY o_ym_date ORDER BY o_ym_date desc
